articles.title: David Richardson admits 'criminals' are 'swanning around' cricket, targetting players and leagues
articles.description: The ICC chief executive did not believe anyone in the anti-corruption unit was compromised but claims in the Al Jazeera documentary would be taken seriously

articles.title: Mature Mohammad Amir finds his comfort zone after Lord's performance
articles.description: Amir had never fronted up for a press conference since returning to cricket in 2016. Not until today

articles.title: Graeme Smith: Shelve T20Is, focus on marketing Tests
articles.description: The former South Africa captain suggests Twenty20 cricket be played only at the domestic level, to help the balance of international cricket and ease workloads on players

articles.title: Lack of youth interest in cricket is 'an English viewpoint', says ICC chief executive David Richardson
articles.description: The event to mark a year until the 2019 World Cup was a call to rally round and support an event that is returning to these shores for the first time in two decades

articles.title: What we're looking forward to at the 2019 World Cup
articles.description: A year before the tournament kicks off, our writers weigh in on what they want to see at the event, and their predictions

articles.title: Sam Curran called up as cover for Ben Stokes after hamstring scare
articles.description: Stokes reported a tight left hamstring during training in Leeds and will be assessed again on Thursday

articles.title: Keaton Jennings: It might be the last Test I play so really want to enjoy it
articles.description: The recalled opener hopes that a combination of technical work and a fresh mental approach will result in better returns this time

articles.title: James Anderson shuts out criticism as England's misfiring Test team reaches crunch time
articles.description: Anderson insisted the England squad was "the best 12 players in the country" and simply suffering from a dip in confidence

articles.title: ICC cricket committee saves the toss
articles.description: After a two-day meeting in Mumbai, it also suggested that ball-tampering and personal abuse should carry serious penalties
